'use strict';
 
Object.defineProperty(exports, '__esModule', {
  value: true
});
exports.addPath = addPath;
 
/**
 * Synchronously adds a path to git staging
 */
function addPath(sh, repoPath) {
  sh.cd(repoPath);
  sh.exec('git add .');
}
